title: 820-2850 delayed backlight
message: Hi i have this 820-2850, which came in with no backlight, when probing for q9807, i got an backlight when pinching the pin of q9807, so I resolder all the pin with leaded solder, now backlight is turning on, but its a bit delayed, like if it just wake up from a sleep, it need a few minutes to wake up the backlight ( image is present ),

title: 820-2850 delayed backlight
message: We need some signals and voltages from backlight area in that moment...

title: 820-2850 delayed backlight
message: ok.. so the actual symptom is.., backlight is turning normally, but if i make it sleep with closing the lid, and opening it, display doesnt come out  anymore,

title: 820-2850 delayed backlight
message:
Sorry i mean 820-2523
I have tried removing bil flex, but still same, backlight will be gone and comeback intermittenly every minutes
If there’s no backlight, 
Lvds looks clean
Ppvout is 0v
Lcd_bklt_en 0v
Bklt_en_l 0v
There is a greenish color at the edge glue for u9600, does this have something to do with mux ?
